programme.title: Ragini Mms 2
programme.desc: A sleazy director`s film shoot in a haunted house unleashes a vengeful spirit.

programme.title: My Name Is Anthony Gonsalves
programme.desc: Riya, an assistant director, falls for Anthony, an aspiring actor, unaware he`s lying about his past. Raised by gangster Sikander, he`s linked to a cop`s disappearance.

programme.title: Amavas
programme.desc: A young couple excitedly explores a once-abandoned mansion, but their dream getaway quickly spirals into a nightmare as sinister forces lurking in the shadows awaken.

programme.title: Kaalidas
programme.desc: Kaalidas, an honest policeman, is tasked with investigating a series of apparent suicides in his city. However, it puts a strain on his marriage with Vidyaa, who soon seeks solace in their new tenant.

programme.title: Jersey
programme.desc: Arjun, a talented but failed cricketer, decides to return to cricket in his late thirties, driven by the desire to represent the Indian cricket team and fulfil his son`s wish for a jersey as a gift.

programme.title: Bangarraju
programme.desc: Bangarraju and Satyabhama come down to settle the life of their grandson Chinna Bangarraju and to save the treasure of temple. 126

programme.title: Bhai Mera Big Brother
programme.desc: A gangster in Hyderabad plans to kill an undercover cop but ends up protecting him after uncovering his secret.

programme.title: Aravind Sametha
programme.desc: Veera Raghava Reddy returns to his village after a tragedy, seeking peace. With the help of Aravindha, he embarks on a journey of self-discovery to end the long-standing feud.

programme.title: Navarathna
programme.desc: Moksha, a photographer, finds an ancient necklace that brings ill fate to those who wear it. Under the guise of capturing rare birds, she goes into a forest and plans to dispose of the ornament.

programme.title: Tholi Prema
programme.desc: Aditya searches for a missing girl while reflecting on his failed romance with Varsha, realizing their differences rooted in his impulsive nature.

programme.title: Alone
programme.desc: Conjoined twins Anjana and Sanjana are inseparable, but strange happenings take a dark turn, uncovering secrets that threaten their bond. Will they stay together through it all?

programme.title: Dillagi
programme.desc: Shalini falls in love with Rajvir, but he breaks her heart. Later, he realises his mistake, but it is too late as she is getting married and things take an unexpected turn.

programme.title: Saaya
programme.desc: Akash is a doctor who loses his wife in an accident. Unable to cope with his loss, he begins to see and hear things that convince him that she is still around.

programme.title: Aatish The Weapon
programme.desc: A man loses his job due to the actions of his twin brother and circumstances lead him down a dark path, ultimately turning him into a feared don.

programme.title: Raazi
programme.desc: Sehmat Khan, an undercover RAW agent, is married into a Pakistani family by her father so that she can get some valuable piece of information about the enemy. 158

programme.title: Phata Poster Nikla Hero
programme.desc: Vishwas Rao poses as an inspector for a photo shoot. Chaos erupts when Kajal mistakes him for a real inspector and his mother arrives, complicating matters.

programme.title: Pardes
programme.desc: Kishorilal tries to find an Indian bride for his westernized son, but things get complicated when the bride, Ganga, develops a strong connection with Arjun, his foster son.

programme.title: Forensic
programme.desc: A police inspector and a forensic expert join forces to capture a serial killer targeting young girls in the small hill town of Mussoorie. They work together to solve the chilling case.

programme.title: Gangaajal
programme.desc: IPS Amit Kumar, an honest police superintendent, is sent to a town to reduce crime but faces corruption from fellow officers and politicians while battling brutal criminals.

programme.title: Odiyan
programme.desc: In early 20th century Kerala, the last `Odiyan` struggles to survive as electricity threatens his clan. He unleashes fear through stealth attacks against those who threaten his people.

programme.title: Sab Moh Maaya Hai
programme.desc: A father dreams of a government job for his educated son, but poverty looms large. Desperate for a better future, the son proposes a shocking plan, testing their bond and morals.

programme.title: Agni Chakra
programme.desc: Inspector Suryaveer dies, partner Satpal injured. Amar, Suryaveer`s brother, aids police to catch culprits.

programme.title: Rascals
programme.desc: Chetan and Bhagat, masters at conning people, attempt to outdo each other to woo a wealthy woman.

programme.title: Hello Charlie
programme.desc: Charlie, a pizza delivery guy, must transport a gorilla from Mumbai to Diu. Their wild adventures together create chaos and comedy in this unlikely buddy journey!

programme.title: Jhoomo Nacho Gaao Yaaro
programme.desc: Jhoomo Nacho Gaao Yaaro is a fun and light-hearted movie about four friends who decide to escape their mundane jobs for a weekend holiday.

programme.title: Return Of Raju
programme.desc: Ramu`s mom turns to her late husband for advice to transform Ramu`s personality, hoping to save his marriage with Seetha. Can love really change a person?

programme.title: Shivam
programme.desc: Shiva Proves To Be The Ideal Friend Who Helps Lovers Unite. However, When He Falls In Love With Tanu, He Faces A Challenge In The Form Of Bhoji Reddy And He Must Also Tackle Abhi, Who Kidnaps Tanu.

programme.title: Vikramadithyan
programme.desc: Adithyan, the son of a dishonored thief who committed suicide, battles all odds and competes with Vikraman for the police officer position, determined to restore his family`s honor.

programme.title: Mission Majnu
programme.desc: R.N Kao warns Indira Gandhi about Pakistan`s nuclear test. Aman, a Raw agent in Pakistan, falls in love while risking his life to stop the test.

programme.title: Golisoda 2
programme.desc: A taxi driver, a gangster and an athlete want to create a space for themselves. However, when fate strikes, they end up losing everything and their struggle towards reclaiming their lives begins.
